sentences.en: A mixture of meteoritic water and cometary water would not work either because this combination would still contain a higher concentration of deuterium than is found in the oceans.
sentences.cn: 陨星水和彗星水的混合也不可能提供地球上的全部水源，因为这种混合水与现在的海水相比，仍然有着较高的。

sentences.en: Scientists think the glass was fused in a meteoritic impact 30 million years ago, making it rare and luminous enough to befit a king.
sentences.cn: 科学家认为这种玻璃是由3000万年前的陨石冲击地面融溶而成，它的珍稀和光亮足以适用于国王。

sentences.en: The momentum of the particles was deduced from meteoritic velocities.
sentences.cn: 粒子的冲量可以从陨石速度推导出来.

sentences.en: Were they meteoritic matter from space, reflected light from polar icebergs or a high-altitude version of lightning?
sentences.cn: 它们是太空里的彗星物质、极地冰山反射的光，还是高空的闪电？
